issue.title: Hall of fame output cannot be turned off?
issue.body:
Hi,

I haven't found any switch to reduce or turn off the printing of the current hall of fame.

Would it be possible to expose `print_every_n_seconds`, or give the user some other option to modify this?

Thanks,
Johann

nodes.body:
Hey Johann,

Good point! I have a "verbosity" argument to `pysr`, but this actually doesn't affect the printing of the hall of fame right now.

I've just added it to master. Now, `verbosity=0` will turn off hall of fame printing.

Cheers,
Miles
